title: Spooked Season V Trailer
description:
A brand NEW season of Spooked begins Friday, August 21st. This is not a path you wish to walk alone… there will be 22 terrifying tales coming to you from the dark side. Be afraid.

Original music by Leon Moriomoto

Season 5 has 22 new episodes, each released weekly on Mondays and Fridays. Select episodes will be available across streaming platforms, but you can find ALL the new episodes only on Luminary. Visit LuminaryPodcasts.com to start listening.
